item.title: Zombie Startups | Danielle Morrill
item.description: My greatest fear as a startup founder isn’t to fail, it is to become a zombie startup. Kind of like in the 6th Sense when Bruce Willis doesn’t realize he is dead and tries to have a nice dinner with his wife, there are startups out there who are still “operating” but might as well not be. Zombie Startups | Danielle Morrill.
